LightningComponentBundle.description: Comprehensive footer component for eCommerce platform with company information, navigation links, newsletter signup, and social media integration

property.name: companyName
property.label: Company Name
property.description: The company name displayed in the footer branding section

property.name: companyDescription
property.default: Your trusted online marketplace for quality products and exceptional service.
property.label: Company Description
property.description: Brief description or tagline text displayed under the company name

property.name: companyAddress
property.default: 123 Commerce Street, Business District, City, State 12345
property.label: Company Address
property.description: Physical address displayed in the contact information section

property.name: companyPhone
property.label: Company Phone
property.description: Phone number displayed in the contact information section

property.name: companyEmail
property.label: Company Email
property.description: Email address displayed in the contact information section

property.name: showPaymentMethods
property.label: Show Payment Methods
property.description: Flag to display payment method icons in the footer

property.name: showNewsletterSignup
property.label: Show Newsletter Signup
property.description: Flag to display the newsletter subscription form

property.name: showSocialMedia
property.label: Show Social Media Links
property.description: Flag to display social media platform links
